articles.title: AI startup Cohere valued at $6.8 billion in latest fundraise, appoints new executives
articles.summary: Cohere was valued at $6.8 billion after its latest $500 million funding round, as the artificial intelligence startup moves to expand its market share in a highly competitive industry.

articles.title: Luca Guadagnino’s Star-Studded OpenAI Movie Adds Bridesmaids Alum To Cast
articles.summary: A new update has arrived for Artificial, with the Luca Guadagnino’s OpenAI movie having now added a Bridesmaids star to the impressive cast.

articles.title: As A Dire Revenue Warning Roils C3.ai Stock, The Company's Search For New Leadership Captures Investor Attention
articles.summary: Shares of C3.ai are continuing their decline on Thursday. The enterprise artificial intelligence company is grappling with the fallout from a dire preliminary earnings report.
articles.translated_title: As A Dire Revenue Warning Roils C3.ai Stock, The Company's Search For New Leadership Captures Investor Attention

articles.title: xAI co-founder leaves Elon Musk’s AI startup to launch AI safety fund, joining wave of executive departures
articles.summary: Another senior figure is walking away from Elon Musk’s AI empire. Igor Babuschkin, one of the original co-founders of Musk’s artificial intelligence startup xAI, announced Wednesday that he's stepping down to start an investment firm focused on AI safety. The new venture, Babuschkin Ventures, will fund research and startups working to make AI more secure

articles.title: Oracle, Google cloud units strike deal for Oracle to sell Gemini models
articles.summary: Oracle and Alphabet said on Thursday their cloud computing units have struck a deal to offer Google's Gemini artificial intelligence models through Oracle's cloud computing services and business applications.
articles.translated_title: Oracle, Google cloud units strike deal for Oracle to sell Gemini models

articles.title: New platform boosts Trump's AI Action Plan to maintain US global leadership
articles.summary: Trump administration launches USAi, a secure generative artificial intelligence evaluation suite enabling federal agencies to adopt AI at scale faster and safer

articles.title: AI demand boosts iPhone maker Foxconn's second-quarter profit by 27%, beating forecasts
articles.summary: Foxconn reported a second-quarter operating profit beat on strength of its growing artificial intelligence server business.
